metadata.name: Night Light with Photocell
metadata.description: LED turns on when dark, off when bright. Photocell voltage divider feeds GP26 ADC, LED controlled by GP15.

wires.description: Wire from Pico 3.3V to breadboard 5F. Provides power to photocell voltage divider.
Wire from Pico ground to breadboard 25A. Common ground point for entire circuit.
Wire from Pico ADC pin GP26 to breadboard 8A. Reads voltage divider output to measure light level.
Wire from breadboard 13A to 25B. Connects bottom of voltage divider resistor to common ground.
Wire from Pico GPIO15 to breadboard 18E. Controls LED on/off via current-limiting resistor.
Wire from breadboard 22A to 25C. Connects LED cathode to common ground.
